abstract: Kingston, a modest-size Hudson Valley city that is home to some of New York State’s most beautiful and historic architecture, offers a fresh crop of bars and restaurants inspired by its old-time charms.
snippet: The Hudson Valley city, home to some of the state’s most beautiful and historic architecture, has a fresh crop of bars and restaurants inspired by its old-time charms.
lead_paragraph: The Hudson Valley city, home to some of the state’s most beautiful and historic architecture, has a fresh crop of bars and restaurants inspired by its old-time charms.

headline.main: Kingston, N.Y., a Rest Stop on the Hudson
